# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(XSF_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(XSF)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
XSFPluginInfo.C
XSFCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
XSFPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
XSFMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtXSFFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
XSFEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtXSFFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IXSFDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IXSFDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IXSFDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MXSFDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MXSFDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MXSFDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MXSFDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EXSFDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EXSFDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EXSFDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EXSFDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EXSFDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EXSFDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EXSFDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EXSFDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases XSF ${INSTALLTARGETS})
